::: {.unit-reading}
# Reading

## Work in small steps

Run code frequently and keep changes small. This helps you spot errors early.

## Read errors carefully

Python errors usually tell you what went wrong and where. Use them to guide debugging.

## Find help

Use built-in help, official docs, and trusted community resources when you are stuck.

::: 
<!-- end unit-reading div -->
